description: A bcnLicenseAlarmNotif signifies that the License service has transitioned
state or a particular event has been detected on the service.

Summary.eval: ($v5==1) ? '$v1 license is valid till $v3' : '$v1 license expired on $v3; Grace period: $v4 days'

tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseExpiryNotif BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseType i 1 BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseAlarmSeverity i 1 BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseExpiry s EXAMPLEE BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseGracePeriod u 9999 BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseValid i 1

$SNMPTRAPCMD BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseExpiryNotif BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseType i 2 BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseAlarmSeverity i 1 BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseExpiry s EXAMPLEE BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseGracePeriod u 9999 BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseValid i 1

$SNMPTRAPCMD BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseExpiryNotif BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseType i 1 BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseAlarmSeverity i 1 BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseExpiry s EXAMPLEE BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseGracePeriod u 9999 BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseValid i 2

$SNMPTRAPCMD BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseExpiryNotif BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseType i 2 BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseAlarmSeverity i 1 BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseExpiry s EXAMPLEE BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseGracePeriod u 9999 BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseValid i 2

description: Type of license. The possible states are:
singleServer(1) The license affects a single server, normally the
server in which it is installed.
multiServer(2) The license affects multiple servers. This is common
for licenses that limit managed units.
variables.name: BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseType

description: The expiration date for the license.
variables.name: BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseExpiry

description: Number of days after the license has expired the functionality
will continue to work. In case this is not applicable the value
variables.name: BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseGracePeriod

description: Number of days after the license has expired the functionality
will continue to work. In case this is not applicable the value
variables.name: BCN-LICENSE-MIB::bcnLicenseValid
